text: He Knows You're Alone is a 1980 American slasher movie directed by Armand Mastroianni. It stars Caitlin O'Heaney, Don Scardino, Elizabeth Kemp, Tom Rolfing, and Tom Hanks in his cinematic debut. It was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites== * * Category:1980 horror movies Category:1980s serial killer movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies about stalking Category:Movies directed by Armand Mastroianni
title: He Knows You're Alone
